Description.p: Any code from a controlled clinical vocabulary supported in the communicating community. This should include a Read Code from Version 2.
See also notes on coded use of EhrObservationValue.
Code taken from one the following code systems:

dl.dd: A code representing a kind of observation which has a separate expressed value of some type. Code may be accompanied by additional qualifying codes from the same coding system.
A code representing a disorder, finding or clinical event. Code may be accompanied by additional qualifying codes from the same coding system.
Code representing an observation or finding.
